channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- spice-client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- spice-client

item.title: CVE-2018-10893|2024-08-05T07:54:34.900Z -- red%20hat -- spice-client
item.description: Multiple integer overflow and buffer overflow issues were discovered in spice-client's handling of LZ compressed frames. A malicious server could cause the client to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code.
